products.title: Penrith Sandstone Roman Blind
products.description: The penrith sandstone roman blind carries a versatile tone, somewhere between the warmth of neutral beige and the contemporary vibes of modern greys. With that in mind, this blind would look fabulous in a whole spectrum of settings, from fresh bedrooms to rustic lounges. The the penrith sandstone roman blind carries a versatile tone, somewhere between the warmth of neutral beige and the contemporary vibes of modern greys.

products.title: Choices Penrith Cream Roller Blind
products.description: When it comes to creating the perfect space, sometimes it pays to just keep things simple. Its the sophisticated way. Thats just what you can do with this choices penrith cream roller blind. That simple, creamy colour will blend into your design scheme, keeping things fresh when it comes to creating the perfect space, sometimes it pays to just keep things simple.

products.title: Penrith Cream Roman Blind
products.description: We understand that sometimes less is most certainly more, especially when it comes to your dcor. Sometimes all you need is a soft, plain blind in a lovely cream colour to finish a room. And thats exactly what we have here with the penrith cream roman blind.
